author: Sophocles
message: Men of perverse opinion do not know the excellence of what is in their hands, till some one dash it from them.
title: Thought of the day

author: Rene Descartes
message: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Responsibility is not inherited, it is a choice that everyone needs to make at some point in their life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Amelia Earhart
message: Never do things others can do and will do, if there are things others cannot do or will not do.
title: Thought of the day
